name: Adaptive Shimmerer
oracle_text:
Flash

flavor_text:
"You sure you want to see what emerges? You might not like it. It definitely won't like you."

name: Adventurous Impulse
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: An adventure without a companion is hardly an adventure at all.

name: Aegis Turtle
flavor_text:
"The endurance of the ancient turtles in a land so harsh makes a strong case for patience, tranquility, and composure."
—Gavi, nest warden

name: Almighty Brushwagg
oracle_text:
Trample
{3}{G}: Almighty Brushwagg gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Laughed at the brushwagg
—Hunters' expression meaning "died unexpectedly"

name: Anticipate
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: Bonder and bonded move in unison, intuiting each other's next move.

name: Blade Banish
oracle_text: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: The Wanderer walks many paths. Her blade travels only one.

name: Blazing Volley

Flash

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature

oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards.
Draw three cards.

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Reach

name: Crystacean
oracle_text: Flash
flavor_text: It loves blending into its environment, ambushing prey, and long scuttles on the beach.

name: Daysquad Marshal

Enchant creature

Vigilance

name: Frenzied Raptor
flavor_text:
